name: Chaos Chambers TV
description:
“A game that oozes charm and packs a surprisingly mean punch” – Stuff.tv

Chaos Chambers is all about speed and acute accuracy. Rev up your little Cube dude and let him loose through vast, brightly lit chambers and tunnels when you’ll need to learn to jump high, double jump and flap!

Find the energy for that extra spring in your step to get you through 100’s of brutal obstacles and beware, many eyes will be watching your journey and there are traps a plenty in the Chaos Chambers. Dodge amongst flying blocks and negotiate floors and ledges that fall away at the slightest touch, run through bubbling pits and alleys that could lead you, well anywhere, timing and bravery is crucial for your survival!

You’ll enter a vibrant, minimalistic world where you must help our super smart and uber speedy hero single jump, flap, slide, flip, and spring your way through utter mayhem in this fast paced arcade action endless runner game.

Can you blast your way through all 140 rooms and reach all 16 Checkpoints along the way?

Game Features:

- Enter 140 Rooms through 16 Checkpoints
- Minimalistic One Touch Controls
- Rocking Upbeat Soundtrack
- Manic Arcade Action Gameplay
